Uses of Interface
Interfaces.SearchCriteria

  • Packages that use SearchCriteria 
    Package Description
    Impls  

    • Uses of SearchCriteria in Impls

      Constructors in Impls with parameters of type SearchCriteria 
      Constructor and Description
      WebCrawler(SearchCriteria match)
      This creates a webcrawler using the default search limits (depth of 5 and maximum total links found of 20), but uses a user defined search function.
      WebCrawler(SearchCriteria match, int maxLinks, int maxDepth)
      This creates a webcrawler with user defined limits on number of links and match return conditions.
